text: Tomasz Piotr Tomiak (17 September 1967 - 21 August 2020) was a Polish rower. He was born in Nowy Tomy≈õl, Poland. He won a bronze medal during the 1992 Summer Olympics. He won a bronze medal in 1991 and a silver medal in 1993 at the World Rowing Championships. Tomiak died on 21 August 2020 of heart failure in Warsaw at the age of 52. ==References== Category:1967 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Polish rowers Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Poland
title: Tomasz Tomiak
